short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture live snapshots from around the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create an account here! https://www.easelonchrome.com/

Easel on Chrome helps you capture live snapshots from around the web and create dashboards. This allows users to track metrics, updates, and messages from many different sites without having to built an API.
